title: My pixel 3 just updated and the middle button at the bottom of the screen no longer works. Know why?
content:
Holding the middle button makes the four Google colours appear for a second and thats it. Pressing the button does nothing and I can't use it to activate "hey Google" command. Furthermore, I can no longer open up the view which shows each open app for quick swaps, usually done by holding down then dragging up on the middle button.

Additionally, double tapping the lock button no longer is a shortcut to my camera. 

Is this part of the update or has it screwed up? Theres a lot I can't do anymore and it kinda sucks...
